SEARCH
Package gutek.entities.algorithms

Class SuperMemo2RevisionAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
gutek.entities.algorithms.RevisionAlgorithm<CardSuperMemo2>
gutek.entities.algorithms.SuperMemo2RevisionAlgorithm
@Entity public class SuperMemo2RevisionAlgorithm extends RevisionAlgorithm<CardSuperMemo2>
A revision algorithm based on the SuperMemo2 method for spaced repetition. This class defines both normal and reverse revision processes, using the SuperMemo2 algorithm to calculate intervals and adjust the easiness factor based on user performance.
